channel.title: Permanent Record on Alireza Yoonesi
channel.description: Recent content in Permanent Record on Alireza Yoonesi

item.title: Deciphering “Permanent Record”: A Surface Level Critique
item.description: During my recent holiday, I decided to delve into the pages of Edward Snowden's memoir, Permanent Record, with the expectation of a thought-provoking and intellectually stimulating experience. I hold a high standard for the quality of literature I engage with, and this book presented both surprises and disappointments.
